definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: I know that things are tough for you now, but try to keep a stiff upper lip .
sentences.chinese: 我知道現在對你來說事態很嚴峻，但你要頑強不屈。

sentences.english: Jabba's enforcers were no match for a group of determined Rebels led by a Jedi Knight.
sentences.chinese: 賈巴的打手無法與絕地武士領導的頑強義軍相匹敵。

sentences.english: The seed vitality, sing songs from the poor not curse.
sentences.chinese: 生命力頑強的種子，從不對瘠土唱詛咒的歌。

sentences.english: Some people tend to tenaciously cling to the misguided concept of racial superiority.
sentences.chinese: 一些人頑強地堅持種族優越性的錯誤觀點。

sentences.english: They failed, but they doggedly kept at it.
sentences.chinese: 他們失敗了，但他們頑強地堅持了下來。

sentences.english: Self-reliance and self-confidence will demand your toughness.
sentences.chinese: 擁有自主和自信也需要你頑強不屈。
她頑強地和疾病做鬥爭。

sentences.english: A cat is said to have nine lives because it is more tenacious of life than many animals.
sentences.chinese: 據說，貓有九條命，是因爲它比其它的動物頑強。

sentences.english: They could no doubt have offered a stiff resistance if attacked.
sentences.chinese: 他們在受到攻擊時，可以頑強抵抗，這是。

sentences.english: Mobile phone tenaciously rings, he answers the phone, is snow.
sentences.chinese: 手機頑強地響着，他接了電話，是小雪。

sentences.english: The army came up against fierce opposition in every town.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊在各個城鎮都遇到頑強抵抗。

sentences.english: With the staunch willpower, change into the innermost feeling to the actions.
sentences.chinese: 用頑強的意志力，把內心的自律意識化爲行動。

sentences.english: Ferguson created “Fergie Time” out of sheer force of will.
sentences.chinese: 弗格森全憑頑強的毅力創造了“弗格森時間”。

sentences.english: Be dynamic and open-mind, has strong willpower and good executive ability.
sentences.chinese: 性格活潑開朗，頑強的意志力和良好的執行力。

sentences.english: In the real environment and space, it narrates the preciousness and tenaciousness of life.
sentences.chinese: 它在現實的環境和空間中，述說著生命的珍貴和頑強。

sentences.english: We've been badly hung up for attacking the town.
sentences.chinese: 攻擊那個城鎮時我們受到頑強的抵抗。

definition: to do everything one can/to spare no effort/to strive
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to defeat/to overpower/to beat/to be defeated
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
